entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 05:41 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.7°C
Wind: E 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
